Review Title: Good hotel  to stay must visit  again
Review Text: It is easy to find your hotel. I booked few hotels but the experience  with your was great. I wil prefer to stay again . staff is also so cooerative and environment is peaceful. Front desk team and concierge  team is so friendy . I must apprecite Ahsan Ali who professionaly dealt with  my  problems

My stay at Hotel Boulevard was exceptional! From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel welcome. The room was spotless, the bed was super comfy, and the breakfast buffet was delicious. A special shout-out to Mr Ahsan and team for their outstanding service and friendly attitude. I highly recommend this hotel

I had a wonderful experience at Hotel Boulevard. The hotel was clean and well-maintained. The amenities were top-notch, including the pool and fitness center. The staff was friendly and efficient. Ehsan in the front desk provided excellent service with a smile. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area

Review Title: great experience with the staff . Every one is so cooperative specially concierge Ahsan
Review Text: Nice place I was confused but staff member Ahsan Ali guilded me so well about every thing and made my all visits so easy . I felt comfortable .Every time I need something staff helped me so well.comfy place to stay. I appreciate Ahsan who is friendly and seems a good communicator .

Review Text: It was a great experience on boulevard Autograph Collection. i have booked many hotel but this was my the best experience of all time. I really suggest you to book in this luxurious  Hotel for making your Dubai visit joyful. I would like to thank Mr. Ahsan for taking care of everything from point to check in to check out.... Thank you for making my stay Memorable.

We had a pleasant stay at this charming, smaller place. Everything was solid and lived up to expectations, even if the stay was rather unspectacular ‚Äì a classic ‚Äústandard‚Äù that neither thrills nor disappoints. Of particular note is the extremely friendly and attentive staff who made our stay very pleasant. The pool area was a highlight: clean, relaxed and with always available cabanas ‚Äì perfect for relaxing. The breakfast buffet was not huge, but the food offered was consistently delicious and of good quality. After a week, however, the choice seemed a bit limited. Overall, a solid stay that did not hold any big surprises, but convinced by friendliness and comfort. We would recommend the place for an uncomplicated getaway.

We had a wonderful experience at this hotel. I unfortunately was very sick from the plane and the hotel staff were extremely supporting and helpful. They checked on me multiple times in my room, sent us a fruit basket and helped us with doctors and visit to the hospital. 
We had a lovely stay, the room was clean and all the staff were so wonderfully kind and helpful and attentive. 
We had breakfast at the Bellarium and it was delicious. We highly recommend staying here and eating at this restaurant.

Review Text:
I had the most incredible stay at Hotel Boulevard Autograph Collection! From the moment I arrived, the staff were ABSOLUTELY AMAZING ‚Äì warm, welcoming, and always happy to help with anything I needed. They truly made the experience extra special.

The room was beautiful ‚Äì super clean, modern, and really comfortable. Room service was excellent, with delicious food delivered quickly and always with a smile.

Breakfast and the restaurant were also a highlight. Every meal was fresh, tasty, and beautifully presented.

Honestly, I can‚Äôt fault a thing. 10/10 ‚Äì I‚Äôll definitely be back and highly recommend.

Hotel Boulevard with my friends; Dubai Mall and Burj Khalifa are both close by. The rooms are modestly but they're really clean. And the floor housekeeping staff are very responsive to any request given., always made sure everything was good and that we had enough of everything.

I had a good stay in this Hotel, the ambiance is very nice and clean the staff is very accommodating and kind. I just want to thank you Talaal for the good and kind service, see you again soon.I love to stay here with my friends and family. See you next time thank you again Talaal and Team

Hotel very medium range is not worth its price. Not suitable for business travel. Not enough spaces in the rooms. Tiny basic bathroom. Nas materials of range. 1 electrical outlet available. No office space even no pen available.

Review Text: I had a great stay at this hotel. The room was very clean, well-maintained, and comfortable ‚Äî exactly what I was hoping for. I also appreciated the efficient communication; all my questions were answered promptly by email, and the staff was helpful and polite. Definitely recommend for anyone looking for a hassle-free and clean¬†place¬†to¬†stay!

Unfortunately, I have to give an extremely bad review here. And that's mainly because the information is just wrong. The photos are definitely outdated and when you put them on, you think you're coming to a top hotel. However, the hotel is extremely unusual and urgently needs a renovation. This hotel is definitely not taken care of and that is probably missing at all corners and ending. Views from terraces on rooftops are disastrous. Terraces are extremely dirty. Awnings are old, broken and dirty. The pool area looks like a bad two star hotel. It looks like Marriott just forgot about this hotel. The location is actually extremely good and you have a quiet walk to the mall and is actually located on the quieter side of town per se the hotel is really a very stylish place there much needed a complete renovation. I only give the two stars because the staff was extremely friendly and endeavoured and the cleaning staff probably goes to all efforts to clean the hotel at least halfway well. Unfortunately, there is probably little to distinguish between wear and dirt because it just looks catastrophic. Stains on the carpets and curtain holes in the walls, non-functioning technical items and extreme dust behind the TVs. Which already shows that there is no longer any ground being cleaned here and that for at least one to two years. This hotel could really be very good and make great money and here you would also pay a good price for the night if you get what you see in the photos. The staff are sorry that they are really trying hard and can probably do nothing more than watch the decay of this hotel. In the hotel are the Toto and the Tartell with two super restaurants which are not part of the hotel but are rented there and have super terraces and a great meal. I think these two probably won't be there much longer either if the hotel keeps falling into disrepair. It's just a shame not to use such a location properly.
